passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. Receives Lane Swap Detector penalties if detected within the top or middle lanes early in the game.

passive_1:
Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within 1050 units of you, consume a charge in two ways:

• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 15 gold and the nearest allied champion kill gold. Damaging a minion below below [50%|30%] of its maximum health  executes it.

• Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, up to one per attack or cast,[22|20] gold.

Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within 1050 units of you, consume a charge in two ways:

• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 20 gold and the nearest allied champion kill gold. Damaging a minion below below [50%|30%] of its maximum health  executes it.

•Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, up to one per attack or cast,[30|28] gold.

Grants a charge every 18 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within 1050 units of you, consume a charge in two ways:

• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 20 gold and the nearest allied champion kill gold. Damaging a minion below below [50%|30%] of its maximum health  executes it.

•Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, up to one per attack or cast,[30|28] gold.
passive_2: Earn 500 gold through QUEST to automatically upgrade to Runic Compass, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
